messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] TV/movies
messages.msgSnippet: ... can remember.  ??? No I don t think it did. There was a sex scene but both people were fully clothed. ... artist in a time when women were not allowed to
messages.messageBody:
>>I don't think Girl with a Pearl Earring had anything graphic that I
can remember. ???>>

No I don't think it did. There was a sex scene but both people were fully clothed.

>>I'ts an AMAZING film about a young woman struggling to become a great
artist in a time when women were not allowed to do art. She's strong
and beautiful and such a great role model.>>

Have you ever read the book Confessions of an Ugly Stepsister by Gregory Maguire? It's a retelling of Cinderella set in the art world of Europe in the 1600's. It's very similar in tone to these movies. It's a great book.

--
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: TV/movies
messages.msgSnippet: Every shot looks like a painting from the 1600 s. You know what? I just realized I was mixing up the Vermeer movie (Girl with a Pearl Earring) with a totally
messages.messageBody:
"Every shot looks like a painting from the 1600's."

You know what? I just realized I was mixing up the Vermeer movie (Girl
with a Pearl Earring) with a totally different film called Artemisia.

I'ts an AMAZING film about a young woman struggling to become a great
artist in a time when women were not allowed to do art. She's strong
and beautiful and such a great role model. THAT'S the movie with
graphic sex scenes in a couple parts.

I don't think Girl with a Pearl Earring had anything graphic that I
can remember. ???

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] TV/movies
messages.msgSnippet: ... a Pearl Earring , so maybe we ll give that a shot. Awesome film, just make sure you screen it first if you have kids that don t care for sex scenes. We
messages.messageBody:
>>"I recorded "Girl with
a Pearl Earring", so maybe we'll give that a shot."

Awesome film, just make sure you screen it first if you have kids that
don't care for sex scenes. We really enjoyed it, but had a couple that
needed to close their eyes for certain parts, because nude sex scenes
bother them. It's short lived, but fairly graphic.>>

Jon and I just watched that again this weekend. The lighting in that movie is amazing! Every shot looks like a painting from the 1600's. Very cool.

--
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."
~Thich Nhat Hanh

messages.subject: TV/movies
messages.msgSnippet: I recorded Girl with a Pearl Earring , so maybe we ll give that a shot. Awesome film, just make sure you screen it first if you have kids that don t care
messages.messageBody:
"I recorded "Girl with
a Pearl Earring", so maybe we'll give that a shot."

Awesome film, just make sure you screen it first if you have kids that
don't care for sex scenes. We really enjoyed it, but had a couple that
needed to close their eyes for certain parts, because nude sex scenes
bother them. It's short lived, but fairly graphic.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
